title: Raku Ri — Way of the Dragon (Lineage Capsule)
summary: Dragon-path circulation; spiral breath and grounding stance. Binds to Geometry (Michael) and Architecture (Uriel) ateliers.
safe_use: Practice seated or standing; no forced breath-holds; stabilize before visual work.
procedures: Root stance: soft knees, spine long.
Trace inner helix with attention; exhale down the spine.
Place the dragon-sigil at navel center; breathe gently through it (3–5 cycles).
Close with a bow; feel the soles of the feet.
references: Comparative dragon spinal work from East/West lineages (intro surveys).
